00017 package WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::UserList;
00018 use base qw(WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor);
00019 
00020 =head1 NAME
00021 
00022 WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::UserList - Entry point for User-specific
00023 data editing
00024 
00025 =cut
00026 
00027 =for comment
00028 
00029 What do we want to be able to do here?
00030 
00031 Filter what users are shown:
00032     - none, all, selected
00033     - matching user_id, matching section, matching recitation
00034 Switch from view mode to edit mode:
00035     - showing visible users
00036     - showing selected users
00037 Switch from edit mode to view and save changes
00038 Switch from edit mode to view and abandon changes
00039 Switch from view mode to password mode:
00040     - showing visible users
00041     - showing selected users
00042 Switch from password mode to view and save changes
00043 Switch from password mode to view and abandon changes
00044 Delete users:
00045     - visible
00046     - selected
00047 Import users:
00048     - replace:
00049         - any users
00050         - visible users
00051         - selected users
00052         - no users
00053     - add:
00054         - any users
00055         - no users
00056 Export users:
00057     - export:
00058         - all
00059         - visible
00060         - selected
00061     - to:
00062         - existing file on server (overwrite): [ list of files ]
00063         - new file on server (create): [ filename ]
00064 
00065 =cut
00066

00179 sub pre_header_initialize {
00180     my $self          = shift;
00181     my $r             = $self->r;
00182     my $urlpath       = $r->urlpath;
00183     my $authz         = $r->authz;
00184     my $ce            = $r->ce;
00185     my $courseName    = $urlpath->arg("courseID");
00186     my $user          = $r->param('user');
00187     # Handle redirects, if any.
00188     ##############################
00189     # Redirect to the addUser page
00190     ##################################
00191 
00192     # Check permissions
00193     return unless $authz->hasPermissions($user, "access_instructor_tools");
00194     
00195     defined($r->param('action')) && $r->param('action') eq 'add' && do {
00196         # fix url and redirect
00197         my $root              = $ce->{webworkURLs}->{root};
00198         
00199         my $numberOfStudents  = $r->param('number_of_students');
00200         warn "number of students not defined " unless defined $numberOfStudents;
00201 
00202         my $uri=$self->systemLink( $urlpath->newFromModule('WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::AddUsers', $r, courseID=>$courseName),
00203                                    params=>{
00204                                             number_of_students=>$numberOfStudents,
00205                                            }
00206         );
00207         #FIXME  does the display mode need to be defined?
00208         #FIXME  url_authen_args also includes an effective user, so the new one must come first.
00209         # even that might not work with every browser since there are two effective User assignments.
00210         $self->reply_with_redirect($uri);
00211         return;
00212     };
00213 }

00243 sub body {
00244     my ($self)       = @_;
00245     my $r            = $self->r;
00246     my $urlpath      = $r->urlpath;
00247     my $db           = $r->db;
00248     my $ce           = $r->ce;
00249     my $authz        = $r->authz;   
00250     my $courseName   = $urlpath->arg("courseID");
00251     my $setID        = $urlpath->arg("setID");       
00252     my $user         = $r->param('user');
00253     
00254     my $root = $ce->{webworkURLs}->{root};
00255 
00256     # templates for getting field names
00257     my $userTemplate            = $self->{userTemplate}            = $db->newUser;
00258     my $permissionLevelTemplate = $self->{permissionLevelTemplate} = $db->newPermissionLevel;
00259     
00260     return CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"}, CGI::p("You are not authorized to access the instructor tools."))
00261         unless $authz->hasPermissions($user, "access_instructor_tools");
00262     
00263     # This table can be consulted when display-ready forms of field names are needed.
00264     my %prettyFieldNames = map { $_ => $_ } 
00265         $userTemplate->FIELDS(),
00266         $permissionLevelTemplate->FIELDS();
00267     
00268     @prettyFieldNames{qw(
00269         user_id 
00270         first_name 
00271         last_name 
00272         email_address 
00273         student_id 
00274         status 
00275         section 
00276         recitation 
00277         comment 
00278         permission
00279     )} = (
00280         "Login Name", 
00281         "First Name", 
00282         "Last Name", 
00283         "Email Address", 
00284         "Student ID", 
00285         "Status", 
00286         "Section", 
00287         "Recitation", 
00288         "Comment", 
00289         "Permission Level"
00290     );
00291     
00292     $self->{prettyFieldNames} = \%prettyFieldNames;
00293     ########## set initial values for state fields
00294     
00295     # exclude set-level proctors
00296     my @allUserIDs = grep {$_ !~ /^set_id:/} $db->listUsers;
00297     # DBFIXME count would work
00298     $self->{totalSets} = $db->listGlobalSets; # save for use in "assigned sets" links
00299     $self->{allUserIDs} = \@allUserIDs;
00300     
00301     # DBFIXME filter in the database
00302     if (defined $r->param("visable_user_string")) {
00303         my @visableUserIDs = split /:/, $r->param("visable_user_string");
00304         $self->{visibleUserIDs} = [ @visableUserIDs ];
00305     } elsif (defined $r->param("visible_users")) {
00306         $self->{visibleUserIDs} = [ $r->param("visible_users") ];
00307     } elsif (defined $r->param("no_visible_users")) {
00308         $self->{visibleUserIDs} = [];
00309     } else {
00310         if ((@allUserIDs > HIDE_USERS_THRESHHOLD) and (not defined $r->param("show_all_users") )) {
00311             $self->{visibleUserIDs} = [];
00312         } else {
00313             $self->{visibleUserIDs} = [ @allUserIDs ];
00314         }
00315     }
00316     
00317     $self->{prevVisibleUserIDs} = $self->{visibleUserIDs};
00318     
00319     if (defined $r->param("selected_users")) {
00320         $self->{selectedUserIDs} = [ $r->param("selected_users") ];
00321     } else {
00322         $self->{selectedUserIDs} = [];
00323     }
00324     
00325     $self->{editMode} = $r->param("editMode") || 0;
00326 
00327     return CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"}, CGI::p("You are not authorized to modify student data"))
00328         if $self->{editMode} and not $authz->hasPermissions($user, "modify_student_data");
00329 
00330 
00331     $self->{passwordMode} = $r->param("passwordMode") || 0;
00332 
00333     return CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"}, CGI::p("You are not authorized to modify student data"))
00334         if $self->{passwordMode} and not $authz->hasPermissions($user, "modify_student_data");
00335 
00336     if (defined $r->param("labelSortMethod")) {
00337         $self->{primarySortField} = $r->param("labelSortMethod");
00338         $self->{secondarySortField} = $r->param("primarySortField");
00339         $self->{ternarySortField} = $r->param("secondarySortField");
00340     }
00341     else {          
00342         $self->{primarySortField} = $r->param("primarySortField") || "last_name";
00343         $self->{secondarySortField} = $r->param("secondarySortField") || "first_name";
00344         $self->{ternarySortField} = $r->param("ternarySortField") || "student_id";
00345     }
00346     
00347     # DBFIXME use an iterator
00348     my @allUsers = $db->getUsers(@allUserIDs);
00349     my (%sections, %recitations);
00350     foreach my $User (@allUsers) {
00351         push @{$sections{defined $User->section ? $User->section : ""}}, $User->user_id;
00352         push @{$recitations{defined $User->recitation ? $User->recitation : ""}}, $User->user_id;
00353     }
00354     $self->{sections} = \%sections;
00355     $self->{recitations} = \%recitations;
00356     
00357     ########## call action handler
00358     
00359     my $actionID = $r->param("action");
00360     if ($actionID) {
00361         unless (grep { $_ eq $actionID } @{ VIEW_FORMS() }, @{ EDIT_FORMS() }, @{ PASSWORD_FORMS() } ) {
00362             die "Action $actionID not found";
00363         }
00364         # Check permissions
00365         if (not FORM_PERMS()->{$actionID} or $authz->hasPermissions($user, FORM_PERMS()->{$actionID})) {
00366             my $actionHandler = "${actionID}_handler";
00367             my %genericParams;
00368             foreach my $param (qw(selected_users)) {
00369                 $genericParams{$param} = [ $r->param($param) ];
00370             }
00371             my %actionParams = $self->getActionParams($actionID);
00372             my %tableParams = $self->getTableParams();
00373             print CGI::p(
00374                 '<div style="color:green">',
00375                 "Result of last action performed: ",
00376                 CGI::i($self->$actionHandler(\%genericParams, \%actionParams, \%tableParams)),
00377                 '</div>',
00378                 CGI::hr()
00379             );
00380         } else {
00381             return CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"}, CGI::p("You are not authorized to perform this action."));
00382         }
00383     }
00384         
00385     ########## retrieve possibly changed values for member fields
00386     
00387     #@allUserIDs = @{ $self->{allUserIDs} }; # do we need this one?
00388     # DBFIXME instead of re-listing, why not add added users to $self->{allUserIDs} ?
00389     # exclude set-level proctors
00390     @allUserIDs = grep {$_ !~ /^set_id:/} $db->listUsers; # recompute value in case some were added
00391     my @visibleUserIDs = @{ $self->{visibleUserIDs} };
00392     my @prevVisibleUserIDs = @{ $self->{prevVisibleUserIDs} };
00393     my @selectedUserIDs = @{ $self->{selectedUserIDs} };
00394     my $editMode = $self->{editMode};
00395     my $passwordMode = $self->{passwordMode};   
00396     my $primarySortField = $self->{primarySortField};
00397     my $secondarySortField = $self->{secondarySortField};
00398     my $ternarySortField = $self->{ternarySortField};
00399     
00400     #warn "visibleUserIDs=@visibleUserIDs\n";
00401     #warn "prevVisibleUserIDs=@prevVisibleUserIDs\n";
00402     #warn "selectedUserIDs=@selectedUserIDs\n";
00403     #warn "editMode=$editMode\n";
00404     #warn "passwordMode=$passwordMode\n";
00405     #warn "primarySortField=$primarySortField\n";
00406     #warn "secondarySortField=$secondarySortField\n";
00407     #warn "ternarySortField=$ternarySortField\n";
00408 
00409     ########## get required users
00410         
00411     my @Users = grep { defined $_ } @visibleUserIDs ? $db->getUsers(@visibleUserIDs) : ();
00412 
00413     my %sortSubs = %{ SORT_SUBS() };
00414     my $primarySortSub = $sortSubs{$primarySortField};
00415     my $secondarySortSub = $sortSubs{$secondarySortField};
00416     my $ternarySortSub = $sortSubs{$ternarySortField};
00417     
00418     # add permission level to user record hash so we can sort it if necessary
00419     # DBFIXME this calls for a join... (i'd like the User record to contain permission level info)
00420     if ($primarySortField eq 'permission' or $secondarySortField eq 'permission' or $ternarySortField eq 'permission') {
00421         foreach my $User (@Users) {
00422             next unless $User;
00423             my $permissionLevel = $db->getPermissionLevel($User->user_id);
00424                             $User->{permission} = $permissionLevel->permission;
00425         }
00426     }
00427         
00428     
00429 #   # don't forget to sort in opposite order of importance
00430 #   @Users = sort $secondarySortSub @Users;
00431 #   @Users = sort $primarySortSub @Users;
00432 #   #@Users = sort byLnFnUid @Users;
00433 
00434 #   Always have a definite sort order even if first three sorts don't determine things
00435     @Users = sort {
00436         &$primarySortSub
00437             ||
00438         &$secondarySortSub 
00439             ||
00440         &$ternarySortSub
00441             ||
00442         byLastName
00443             ||
00444         byFirstName
00445             ||
00446         byUserID
00447         } 
00448         @Users;
00449         
00450     my @PermissionLevels;
00451     
00452     for (my $i = 0; $i < @Users; $i++) {
00453         my $User = $Users[$i];
00454         # DBFIX we maybe already have the permission level from above (for use in sorting)
00455         my $PermissionLevel = $db->getPermissionLevel($User->user_id); # checked
00456         
00457         # DBFIXME this should go in the DB layer
00458         unless ($PermissionLevel) {
00459             # uh oh! no permission level record found!
00460             warn "added missing permission level for user ", $User->user_id, "\n";
00461             
00462             # create a new permission level record
00463             $PermissionLevel = $db->newPermissionLevel;
00464             $PermissionLevel->user_id($User->user_id);
00465             $PermissionLevel->permission(0);
00466             
00467             # add it to the database
00468             $db->addPermissionLevel($PermissionLevel);
00469         }
00470         
00471         $PermissionLevels[$i] = $PermissionLevel;
00472     }
00473     
00474     ########## print beginning of form
00475     
00476     print CGI::start_form({method=>"post", action=>$self->systemLink($urlpath,authen=>0), name=>"userlist"});
00477     print $self->hidden_authen_fields();
00478     
00479     ########## print state data
00480     
00481     print "\n<!-- state data here -->\n";
00482     
00483     if (@visibleUserIDs) {
00484         print CGI::hidden(-name=>"visible_users", -value=>\@visibleUserIDs);
00485     } else {
00486         print CGI::hidden(-name=>"no_visible_users", -value=>"1");
00487     }
00488     
00489     if (@prevVisibleUserIDs) {
00490         print CGI::hidden(-name=>"prev_visible_users", -value=>\@prevVisibleUserIDs);
00491     } else {
00492         print CGI::hidden(-name=>"no_prev_visible_users", -value=>"1");
00493     }
00494     
00495     print CGI::hidden(-name=>"editMode", -value=>$editMode);
00496     
00497     print CGI::hidden(-name=>"passwordMode", -value=>$passwordMode);
00498     
00499     print CGI::hidden(-name=>"primarySortField", -value=>$primarySortField);
00500     print CGI::hidden(-name=>"secondarySortField", -value=>$secondarySortField);
00501     print CGI::hidden(-name=>"ternarySortField", -value=>$ternarySortField);
00502     
00503     print "\n<!-- state data here -->\n";
00504     
00505     ########## print action forms
00506     
00507     print CGI::start_table({});
00508     print CGI::Tr({}, CGI::td({-colspan=>2}, "Select an action to perform:"));
00509     
00510     my @formsToShow;
00511     if ($editMode) {
00512         @formsToShow = @{ EDIT_FORMS() };
00513     }elsif ($passwordMode) {
00514         @formsToShow = @{ PASSWORD_FORMS() };   
00515     } else {
00516         @formsToShow = @{ VIEW_FORMS() };
00517     }
00518     
00519     my $i = 0;
00520     foreach my $actionID (@formsToShow) {
00521         # Check permissions
00522         next if FORM_PERMS()->{$actionID} and not $authz->hasPermissions($user, FORM_PERMS()->{$actionID});
00523         my $actionForm = "${actionID}_form";
00524         my $onChange = "document.userlist.action[$i].checked=true";
00525         my %actionParams = $self->getActionParams($actionID);
00526         
00527         print CGI::Tr({-valign=>"top"},
00528             CGI::td({}, CGI::input({-type=>"radio", -name=>"action", -value=>$actionID})),
00529             CGI::td({}, $self->$actionForm($onChange, %actionParams))
00530         );
00531         
00532         $i++;
00533     }
00534     my $selectAll =CGI::input({-type=>'button', -name=>'check_all', -value=>'Select all users',
00535            onClick => "for (i in document.userlist.elements)  { 
00536                            if (document.userlist.elements[i].name =='selected_users') { 
00537                                document.userlist.elements[i].checked = true
00538                            }
00539                         }" });
00540     my $selectNone =CGI::input({-type=>'button', -name=>'check_none', -value=>'Unselect all users',
00541            onClick => "for (i in document.userlist.elements)  { 
00542                            if (document.userlist.elements[i].name =='selected_users') { 
00543                               document.userlist.elements[i].checked = false
00544                            }
00545                         }" });
00546     unless ($editMode or $passwordMode) {
00547         print CGI::Tr({}, CGI::td({ colspan=>2, -align=>"center"},
00548             $selectAll." ". $selectNone
00549             )
00550         );
00551     }
00552     print CGI::Tr({}, CGI::td({ colspan=>2, -align=>"center"},
00553         CGI::submit(-value=>"Take Action!") 
00554         )
00555     );
00556     print CGI::end_table();
00557     
00558     ########## print table
00559     
00560     print CGI::p({},"Showing ", scalar @Users, " out of ", scalar @allUserIDs, " users.");
00561     
00562     print CGI::p("If a password field is left blank, the student's current password will be maintained.") if $passwordMode;
00563     if ($editMode) {
00564        
00565 
00566         print CGI::p('<b>Click</b> on the login name to <b>edit individual problem set data</b>, (e.g. due dates) for these students.');
00567     }
00568     $self->printTableHTML(\@Users, \@PermissionLevels, \%prettyFieldNames,
00569         editMode => $editMode,
00570         passwordMode => $passwordMode,
00571         selectedUserIDs => \@selectedUserIDs,
00572         primarySortField => $primarySortField,
00573         secondarySortField => $secondarySortField,
00574         visableUserIDs => \@visibleUserIDs,
00575     );
00576     
00577     
00578     ########## print end of form
00579     
00580     print CGI::end_form();
00581 
00582     return "";
00583 }

00585 ################################################################################
00586 # extract particular params and put them in a hash (values are ARRAYREFs!)
00587 ################################################################################
00588 
00589 sub getActionParams {
00590     my ($self, $actionID) = @_;
00591     my $r = $self->{r};
00592     
00593     my %actionParams;
00594     foreach my $param ($r->param) {
00595         next unless $param =~ m/^action\.$actionID\./;
00596         $actionParams{$param} = [ $r->param($param) ];
00597     }
00598     return %actionParams;
00599 }
00600 
00601 sub getTableParams {
00602     my ($self) = @_;
00603     my $r = $self->{r};
00604     
00605     my %tableParams;
00606     foreach my $param ($r->param) {
00607         next unless $param =~ m/^(?:user|permission)\./;
00608         $tableParams{$param} = [ $r->param($param) ];
00609     }
00610     return %tableParams;
00611 }

00682 
00683 # this action handler modifies the "visibleUserIDs" field based on the contents
00684 # of the "action.filter.scope" parameter and the "selected_users" 
00685 # DBFIXME filtering should happen in the database!
00686 sub filter_handler {
00687     my ($self, $genericParams, $actionParams, $tableParams) = @_;
00688     
00689     my $r = $self->r;
00690     my $db = $r->db;
00691     
00692     my $result;
00693     
00694     my $scope = $actionParams->{"action.filter.scope"}->[0];
00695     if ($scope eq "all") {
00696         $result = "showing all users";
00697         $self->{visibleUserIDs} = $self->{allUserIDs};
00698     } elsif ($scope eq "none") {
00699         $result = "showing no users";
00700         $self->{visibleUserIDs} = [];
00701     } elsif ($scope eq "selected") {
00702         $result = "showing selected users";
00703         $self->{visibleUserIDs} = $genericParams->{selected_users}; # an arrayref
00704     } elsif ($scope eq "match_regex") {
00705         $result = "showing matching users";
00706         my $regex = $actionParams->{"action.filter.user_ids"}->[0];
00707         my $field = $actionParams->{"action.filter.field"}->[0];
00708         my @userRecords = $db->getUsers(@{$self->{allUserIDs}});
00709         my @userIDs;
00710         foreach my $record (@userRecords) {
00711             next unless $record;
00712 
00713             # add permission level to user record hash so we can match it if necessary
00714             if ($field eq "permission") {
00715                 my $permissionLevel = $db->getPermissionLevel($record->user_id);
00716                             $record->{permission} = $permissionLevel->permission;
00717             }
00718             push @userIDs, $record->user_id if $record->{$field} =~ /^$regex/i;
00719         }
00720         $self->{visibleUserIDs} = \@userIDs;
00721     } elsif ($scope eq "match_ids") {
00722         my @userIDs = split /\s*,\s*/, $actionParams->{"action.filter.user_ids"}->[0];
00723         $self->{visibleUserIDs} = \@userIDs;
00724     } elsif ($scope eq "match_section") {
00725         my $section = $actionParams->{"action.filter.section"}->[0];
00726         $self->{visibleUserIDs} = $self->{sections}->{$section}; # an arrayref
00727     } elsif ($scope eq "match_recitation") {
00728         my $recitation = $actionParams->{"action.filter.recitation"}->[0];
00729         $self->{visibleUserIDs} = $self->{recitations}->{$recitation}; # an arrayref
00730     }
00731     
00732     return $result;
00733 }

00809     $self->{ternarySortField} = $ternary;

00811     my %names = (
00812                 user_id     => "Login Name",
00813                 first_name  => "First Name",
00814                 last_name   => "Last Name",

00822     );
00823     
00824     return "Users sorted by $names{$primary}, then by $names{$secondary}, then by $names{$ternary}.";

00915             -name => "action.delete.scope",
00916             -values => [qw(none selected)],
00917             -default => $actionParams{"action.delete.scope"}->[0] || "none",
00918             -labels => {
00919                 none     => "no users.",
00920                 #visible  => "visible users.",
00921                 selected => "selected users."
00922             },

00929 
00930 sub delete_handler {
00931     my ($self, $genericParams, $actionParams, $tableParams) = @_;
00932     my $r         = $self->r;
00933     my $db        = $r->db;
00934     my $user      = $r->param('user');
00935     my $scope = $actionParams->{"action.delete.scope"}->[0];
00936     
00937     my @userIDsToDelete = ();
00938     #if ($scope eq "visible") {
00939     #   @userIDsToDelete = @{ $self->{visibleUserIDs} };
00940     #} elsif ($scope eq "selected") {
00941     if ($scope eq "selected") {
00942         @userIDsToDelete = @{ $self->{selectedUserIDs} };
00943     }
00944     
00945     my %allUserIDs = map { $_ => 1 } @{ $self->{allUserIDs} };
00946     my %visibleUserIDs = map { $_ => 1 } @{ $self->{visibleUserIDs} };
00947     my %selectedUserIDs = map { $_ => 1 } @{ $self->{selectedUserIDs} };
00948     
00949     my $error = "";
00950     my $num = 0;
00951     foreach my $userID (@userIDsToDelete) {
00952         if ($user eq $userID) { # don't delete yourself!!
00953             $error = "You cannot delete yourself!";
00954             next;
00955         }
00956         delete $allUserIDs{$userID};
00957         delete $visibleUserIDs{$userID};
00958         delete $selectedUserIDs{$userID};
00959         $db->deleteUser($userID);
00960         $num++;
00961     }
00962     
00963     $self->{allUserIDs} = [ keys %allUserIDs ];
00964     $self->{visibleUserIDs} = [ keys %visibleUserIDs ];
00965     $self->{selectedUserIDs} = [ keys %selectedUserIDs ];
00966     
00967     return "deleted $num user" . ($num == 1 ? "" : "s.  ") . $error;
00968 }

00988             -onchange => $onChange,
00989         ),
00990         "replacing",
00991         CGI::popup_menu(
00992             -name => "action.import.replace",
00993             -values => [qw(any visible selected none)],
00994             -default => $actionParams{"action.import.replace"}->[0] || "none",
00995             -labels => {
00996                 any => "any",
00997                 visible => "visible",
00998                 selected => "selected",
00999                 none => "no",
01000             },
01001             -onchange => $onChange,

01004         CGI::popup_menu(
01005             -name => "action.import.add",
01006             -values => [qw(any none)],

01017 
01018 sub import_handler {
01019     my ($self, $genericParams, $actionParams, $tableParams) = @_;
01020     
01021     my $source = $actionParams->{"action.import.source"}->[0];
01022     my $add = $actionParams->{"action.import.add"}->[0];
01023     my $replace = $actionParams->{"action.import.replace"}->[0];
01024     
01025     my $fileName = $source;
01026     my $createNew = $add eq "any";
01027     my $replaceExisting;
01028     my @replaceList;
01029     if ($replace eq "any") {
01030         $replaceExisting = "any";
01031     } elsif ($replace eq "none") {
01032         $replaceExisting = "none";
01033     } elsif ($replace eq "visible") {
01034         $replaceExisting = "listed";
01035         @replaceList = @{ $self->{visibleUserIDs} };
01036     } elsif ($replace eq "selected") {
01037         $replaceExisting = "listed";
01038         @replaceList = @{ $self->{selectedUserIDs} };
01039     }
01040     
01041     my ($replaced, $added, $skipped)
01042         = $self->importUsersFromCSV($fileName, $createNew, $replaceExisting, @replaceList);
01043     
01044     # make new users visible... do we really want to do this? probably.
01045     push @{ $self->{visibleUserIDs} }, @$added;
01046     
01047     my $numReplaced = @$replaced;
01048     my $numAdded = @$added;
01049     my $numSkipped = @$skipped;
01050     
01051     return $numReplaced . " user" . ($numReplaced == 1 ? "" : "s") . " replaced, "
01052         . $numAdded . " user" . ($numAdded == 1 ? "" : "s") . " added, "
01053         . $numSkipped . " user" . ($numSkipped == 1 ? "" : "s") . " skipped"
01054         . " (" . join (", ", @$skipped) . ") ";
01055 }

01092 sub export_handler {
01093     my ($self, $genericParams, $actionParams, $tableParams) = @_;
01094     my $r       = $self->r;
01095     my $ce      = $r->ce;
01096     my $dir     = $ce->{courseDirs}->{templates};
01097     
01098     my $scope = $actionParams->{"action.export.scope"}->[0];
01099     my $target = $actionParams->{"action.export.target"}->[0];
01100     my $new = $actionParams->{"action.export.new"}->[0];
01101     
01102     #get name of templates directory as it appears in file manager
01103     $dir =~ s|.*/||;
01104     
01105     my $fileName;
01106     if ($target eq "new") {
01107         $fileName = $new;
01108     } else {
01109         $fileName = $target;
01110     }
01111     
01112     $fileName .= ".lst" unless $fileName =~ m/\.lst$/;
01113     
01114     my @userIDsToExport;
01115     if ($scope eq "all") {
01116         @userIDsToExport = @{ $self->{allUserIDs} };
01117     } elsif ($scope eq "visible") {
01118         @userIDsToExport = @{ $self->{visibleUserIDs} };
01119     } elsif ($scope eq "selected") {
01120         @userIDsToExport = @{ $self->{selectedUserIDs} };
01121     }
01122     
01123     $self->exportUsersToCSV($fileName, @userIDsToExport);
01124     
01125     return scalar @userIDsToExport . " users exported to file &nbsp;&nbsp; $dir/$fileName";
01126 }

01133 sub cancelEdit_handler {
01134     my ($self, $genericParams, $actionParams, $tableParams) = @_;
01135     my $r      = $self->r;
01136     
01137     #$self->{selectedUserIDs} = $self->{visibleUserIDs};
01138         # only do the above if we arrived here via "edit selected users"
01139     if (defined $r->param("prev_visible_users")) {
01140         $self->{visibleUserIDs} = [ $r->param("prev_visible_users") ];
01141     } elsif (defined $r->param("no_prev_visible_users")) {
01142         $self->{visibleUserIDs} = [];
01143     } else {
01144         # leave it alone
01145     }
01146     $self->{editMode} = 0;
01147     
01148     return "changes abandoned";
01149 }

01155 
01156 sub saveEdit_handler {
01157     my ($self, $genericParams, $actionParams, $tableParams) = @_;
01158     my $r           = $self->r;
01159     my $db          = $r->db;
01160     
01161     my @visibleUserIDs = @{ $self->{visibleUserIDs} };
01162     foreach my $userID (@visibleUserIDs) {
01163         my $User = $db->getUser($userID); # checked
01164         die "record for visible user $userID not found" unless $User;
01165         my $PermissionLevel = $db->getPermissionLevel($userID); # checked
01166         die "permissions for $userID not defined" unless defined $PermissionLevel;
01167         foreach my $field ($User->NONKEYFIELDS()) {
01168             my $param = "user.${userID}.${field}";
01169             if (defined $tableParams->{$param}->[0]) {
01170                 $User->$field($tableParams->{$param}->[0]);
01171             }
01172         }
01173         
01174         foreach my $field ($PermissionLevel->NONKEYFIELDS()) {
01175             my $param = "permission.${userID}.${field}";
01176             if (defined $tableParams->{$param}->[0]) {
01177                 $PermissionLevel->$field($tableParams->{$param}->[0]);
01178             }
01179         }
01180         
01181         $db->putUser($User);
01182         $db->putPermissionLevel($PermissionLevel);
01183     }
01184     
01185     if (defined $r->param("prev_visible_users")) {
01186         $self->{visibleUserIDs} = [ $r->param("prev_visible_users") ];
01187     } elsif (defined $r->param("no_prev_visible_users")) {
01188         $self->{visibleUserIDs} = [];
01189     } else {
01190         # leave it alone
01191     }
01192     
01193     $self->{editMode} = 0;
01194     
01195     return "changes saved";
01196 }
01197 
01198 sub cancelPassword_form {
01199     my ($self, $onChange, %actionParams) = @_;

01201 }
01202 
01203 sub cancelPassword_handler {
01204     my ($self, $genericParams, $actionParams, $tableParams) = @_;
01205     my $r      = $self->r;
01206     
01207     #$self->{selectedUserIDs} = $self->{visibleUserIDs};
01208         # only do the above if we arrived here via "edit selected users"
01209     if (defined $r->param("prev_visible_users")) {
01210         $self->{visibleUserIDs} = [ $r->param("prev_visible_users") ];
01211     } elsif (defined $r->param("no_prev_visible_users")) {
01212         $self->{visibleUserIDs} = [];
01213     } else {
01214         # leave it alone
01215     }
01216     $self->{passwordMode} = 0;
01217     
01218     return "changes abandoned";
01219 }
01220 
01221 sub savePassword_form {
01222     my ($self, $onChange, %actionParams) = @_;
01223     return "Save changes";
01224 }
01225 
01226 sub savePassword_handler {
01227     my ($self, $genericParams, $actionParams, $tableParams) = @_;
01228     my $r           = $self->r;
01229     my $db          = $r->db;
01230     
01231     my @visibleUserIDs = @{ $self->{visibleUserIDs} };
01232     foreach my $userID (@visibleUserIDs) {
01233         my $User = $db->getUser($userID); # checked
01234         die "record for visible user $userID not found" unless $User;
01235         my $param = "user.${userID}.new_password";
01236             if ((defined $tableParams->{$param}->[0]) and ($tableParams->{$param}->[0])) {
01237                 my $newP = $tableParams->{$param}->[0];
01238                 my $Password = eval {$db->getPassword($User->user_id)}; # checked       
01239                 my  $cryptPassword = cryptPassword($newP);                                           
01240                 $Password->password(cryptPassword($newP));
01241                 eval { $db->putPassword($Password) };               
01242             }
01243     }
01244     
01245     if (defined $r->param("prev_visible_users")) {
01246         $self->{visibleUserIDs} = [ $r->param("prev_visible_users") ];
01247     } elsif (defined $r->param("no_prev_visible_users")) {
01248         $self->{visibleUserIDs} = [];
01249     } else {
01250         # leave it alone
01251     }
01252     
01253     $self->{passwordMode} = 0;
01254     
01255     return "new passwords saved";
01256 }

01263 sub byUserID       { lc $a->user_id       cmp lc $b->user_id       }
01264 sub byFirstName    {  (defined $a->first_name && defined $b->first_name) ?  lc $a->first_name cmp lc $b->first_name  : 0;  }
01265 sub byLastName     {  (defined $a->last_name  && defined $b->last_name ) ?  lc $a->last_name  cmp lc $b->last_name   : 0;  }
01266 sub byEmailAddress { lc $a->email_address cmp lc $b->email_address }
01267 sub byStudentID    { lc $a->student_id    cmp lc $b->student_id    }
01268 sub byStatus       { lc $a->status        cmp lc $b->status        }
01269 sub bySection      { lc $a->section       cmp lc $b->section       }
01270 sub byRecitation   { lc $a->recitation    cmp lc $b->recitation    }
01271 sub byComment      { lc $a->comment       cmp lc $b->comment       }
01272 sub byPermission   { $a->{permission}    <=>  $b->{permission}     }  ## permission level is added to user record hash so we can sort it if necessary
01273 
01274 # sub byLnFnUid { &byLastName || &byFirstName || &byUserID }

01280 # generate labels for section/recitation popup menus
01281 sub menuLabels {
01282     my ($self, $hashRef) = @_;
01283     my %hash = %$hashRef;
01284     
01285     my %result;
01286     foreach my $key (keys %hash) {
01287         my $count = @{ $hash{$key} };
01288         my $displayKey = $key || "<none>";
01289         $result{$key} = "$displayKey ($count users)";
01290     }
01291     return %result;
01292 }
01293 
01294 # FIXME REFACTOR this belongs in a utility class so that addcourse can use it!
01295 # (we need a whole suite of higher-level import/export functions somewhere)
01296 sub importUsersFromCSV {
01297     my ($self, $fileName, $createNew, $replaceExisting, @replaceList) = @_;
01298     my $r     = $self->r;
01299     my $ce    = $r->ce;
01300     my $db    = $r->db;
01301     my $dir   = $ce->{courseDirs}->{templates};
01302     my $user  = $r->param('user');
01303     
01304     die "illegal character in input: '/'" if $fileName =~ m|/|;
01305     die "won't be able to read from file $dir/$fileName: does it exist? is it readable?"
01306         unless -r "$dir/$fileName";
01307     
01308     my %allUserIDs = map { $_ => 1 } @{ $self->{allUserIDs} };
01309     my %replaceOK;
01310     if ($replaceExisting eq "none") {
01311         %replaceOK = ();
01312     } elsif ($replaceExisting eq "listed") {
01313         %replaceOK = map { $_ => 1 } @replaceList;
01314     } elsif ($replaceExisting eq "any") {
01315         %replaceOK = %allUserIDs;
01316     }
01317     
01318     my $default_permission_level = $ce->{default_permission_level};
01319     
01320     my (@replaced, @added, @skipped);
01321     
01322     # get list of hashrefs representing lines in classlist file
01323     my @classlist = parse_classlist("$dir/$fileName");
01324     
01325     # Default status is enrolled -- fetch abbreviation for enrolled
01326     my $default_status_abbrev = $ce->{statuses}->{Enrolled}->{abbrevs}->[0];
01327     
01328     foreach my $record (@classlist) {
01329         my %record = %$record;
01330         my $user_id = $record{user_id};
01331         
01332         unless (WeBWorK::DB::check_user_id($user_id) ) {  # try to catch lines with bad characters
01333             push @skipped, $user_id;
01334             next;
01335         }
01336         if ($user_id eq $user) { # don't replace yourself!!
01337             push @skipped, $user_id;
01338             next;
01339         }
01340         
01341         if (exists $allUserIDs{$user_id} and not exists $replaceOK{$user_id}) {
01342             push @skipped, $user_id;
01343             next;
01344         }
01345         
01346         if (not exists $allUserIDs{$user_id} and not $createNew) {
01347             push @skipped, $user_id;
01348             next;
01349         }
01350         
01351         # set default status is status field is "empty"
01352         $record{status} = $default_status_abbrev
01353             unless defined $record{status} and $record{status} ne "";
01354         
01355         # set password from student ID if password field is "empty"
01356         if (not defined $record{password} or $record{password} eq "") {
01357             if (defined $record{student_id} and $record{student_id} ne "") {
01358                 # crypt the student ID and use that
01359                 $record{password} = cryptPassword($record{student_id});
01360             } else {
01361                 # an empty password field in the database disables password login
01362                 $record{password} = "";
01363             }
01364         }
01365         
01366         # set default permission level if permission level is "empty"
01367         $record{permission} = $default_permission_level
01368             unless defined $record{permission} and $record{permission} ne "";
01369         
01370         my $User = $db->newUser(%record);
01371         my $PermissionLevel = $db->newPermissionLevel(user_id => $user_id, permission => $record{permission});
01372         my $Password = $db->newPassword(user_id => $user_id, password => $record{password});
01373         
01374         # DBFIXME use REPLACE
01375         if (exists $allUserIDs{$user_id}) {
01376             $db->putUser($User);
01377             $db->putPermissionLevel($PermissionLevel);
01378             $db->putPassword($Password);
01379             push @replaced, $user_id;
01380         } else {
01381             $db->addUser($User);
01382             $db->addPermissionLevel($PermissionLevel);
01383             $db->addPassword($Password);
01384             push @added, $user_id;
01385         }
01386     }
01387     
01388     return \@replaced, \@added, \@skipped;
01389 }
01390 
01391 sub exportUsersToCSV {
01392     my ($self, $fileName, @userIDsToExport) = @_;
01393     my $r       = $self->r;
01394     my $ce      = $r->ce;
01395     my $db      = $r->db;
01396     my $dir     = $ce->{courseDirs}->{templates};
01397         
01398     die "illegal character in input: '/'" if $fileName =~ m|/|;
01399     
01400     my @records;
01401     
01402     # DBFIXME use an iterator here
01403     my @Users = $db->getUsers(@userIDsToExport);
01404     my @Passwords = $db->getPasswords(@userIDsToExport);
01405     my @PermissionLevels = $db->getPermissionLevels(@userIDsToExport);
01406     foreach my $i (0 .. $#userIDsToExport) {
01407         my $User = $Users[$i];
01408         my $Password = $Passwords[$i];
01409         my $PermissionLevel = $PermissionLevels[$i];
01410         next unless defined $User;
01411         my %record = (
01412             defined $PermissionLevel ? $PermissionLevel->toHash : (),
01413             defined $Password ? $Password->toHash : (),
01414             $User->toHash,
01415         );
01416         push @records, \%record;
01417     }
01418     
01419     write_classlist("$dir/$fileName", @records);
01420 }
01421 
01422 ################################################################################
01423 # "display" methods
01424 ################################################################################
01425 
01426 sub fieldEditHTML {
01427     my ($self, $fieldName, $value, $properties) = @_;
01428     my $ce = $self->r->ce;
01429     my $size = $properties->{size};
01430     my $type = $properties->{type};
01431     my $access = $properties->{access};
01432     my $items = $properties->{items};
01433     my $synonyms = $properties->{synonyms};
01434     
01435     if ($type eq "email") {
01436         if ($value eq '&nbsp;') {
01437             return $value;}
01438         else {
01439             return CGI::a({-href=>"mailto:$value"},$value);
01440         }
01441     }
01442     
01443     if ($access eq "readonly") {
01444         # hack for status
01445         if ($type eq "status") {
01446             my $status_name = $ce->status_abbrev_to_name($value);
01447             if (defined $status_name) {
01448                 $value = "$status_name ($value)";
01449             }
01450         }
01451         return $value;
01452     }
01453     
01454     if ($type eq "number" or $type eq "text") {
01455         return CGI::input({type=>"text", name=>$fieldName, value=>$value, size=>$size});
01456     }
01457         
01458     if ($type eq "enumerable") {
01459         my $matched = undef; # Whether a synonym match has occurred
01460 
01461         # Process synonyms for enumerable objects
01462         foreach my $synonym (keys %$synonyms) {
01463             if ($synonym ne "*" and $value =~ m/$synonym/) {
01464                 $value = $synonyms->{$synonym};
01465                 $matched = 1;
01466             }
01467         }
01468         
01469         if (!$matched and exists $synonyms->{"*"}) {
01470             $value = $synonyms->{"*"};
01471         }
01472         
01473         return CGI::popup_menu({
01474             name => $fieldName, 
01475             values => [keys %$items],
01476             default => $value,
01477             labels => $items,
01478         });
01479     }
01480     
01481     if ($type eq "status") {
01482         # we used to surreptitously map synonyms to a canonical value...
01483         # so should we continue to do that?
01484         my $status_name = $ce->status_abbrev_to_name($value);
01485         if (defined $status_name) {
01486             $value = ($ce->status_name_to_abbrevs($status_name))[0];
01487         }
01488         
01489         my (@values, %labels);
01490         while (my ($k, $v) = each %{$ce->{statuses}}) {
01491             my @abbrevs = @{$v->{abbrevs}};
01492             push @values, $abbrevs[0];
01493             foreach my $abbrev (@abbrevs) {
01494                 $labels{$abbrev} = $k;
01495             }
01496         }
01497         
01498         return CGI::popup_menu({
01499             name => $fieldName, 
01500             values => \@values,
01501             default => $value,
01502             labels => \%labels,
01503         });
01504     }
01505 
01506     if ($type eq "permission") {
01507         my ($default, @values, %labels);
01508         my %roles = %{$ce->{userRoles}};
01509         foreach my $role (sort {$roles{$a}<=>$roles{$b}} keys(%roles) ) {
01510             my $val = $roles{$role};
01511 
01512             push(@values, $val);
01513             $labels{$val} = $role;
01514             $default = $val if ( $value eq $role );
01515         }
01516         return CGI::popup_menu({
01517             -name => $fieldName,
01518             -values => \@values,
01519              -default => [$default], # force default of 0 to be a selector value (instead of 
01520                                     # being considered as a null -- now works with CGI 3.42
01521             #-default => $default,   # works with CGI 3.49 (but the above does not, go figure
01522             -labels => \%labels,
01523             -override => 1,    # force default value to be selected. (corrects bug on newer CGI
01524         });
01525     }
01526 }
01527 
01528 sub recordEditHTML {
01529     my ($self, $User, $PermissionLevel, %options) = @_;
01530     my $r           = $self->r;
01531     my $urlpath     = $r->urlpath;
01532     my $db          = $r->db;
01533     my $ce          = $r->ce;
01534     my $authz   = $r->authz;
01535     my $user    = $r->param('user');
01536     my $root        = $ce->{webworkURLs}->{root};
01537     my $courseName  = $urlpath->arg("courseID");
01538     
01539     my $editMode = $options{editMode};
01540     my $passwordMode = $options{passwordMode};
01541     my $userSelected = $options{userSelected};
01542 
01543     my $statusClass = $ce->status_abbrev_to_name($User->status);
01544 
01545     my $sets = $db->countUserSets($User->user_id);
01546     my $totalSets = $self->{totalSets};
01547     
01548     my $changeEUserURL = $self->systemLink($urlpath->new(type=>'set_list',args=>{courseID=>$courseName}),
01549                                            params => {effectiveUser => $User->user_id}
01550     );
01551     
01552     my $setsAssignedToUserURL = $self->systemLink($urlpath->new(type=>'instructor_user_detail',
01553                                                                 args=>{courseID => $courseName, 
01554                                                                        userID   => $User->user_id
01555                                                                        }),
01556                                            params => {effectiveUser => $User->user_id}
01557     );
01558 
01559     my $userListURL = $self->systemLink($urlpath->new(type=>'instructor_user_list', args=>{courseID => $courseName} )) . "&editMode=1&visible_users=" . $User->user_id;
01560 
01561     my $imageURL = $ce->{webworkURLs}->{htdocs}."/images/edit.gif";
01562         my $imageLink = CGI::a({href => $userListURL}, CGI::img({src=>$imageURL, border=>0}));
01563     
01564     my @tableCells;
01565     
01566     # Select
01567     if ($editMode or $passwordMode) {
01568         # column not there
01569     } else {
01570         # selection checkbox
01571         push @tableCells, CGI::checkbox(
01572             -name => "selected_users",
01573             -value => $User->user_id,
01574             -checked => $userSelected,
01575             -label => "",
01576         );
01577     }
01578     
01579     # Act As
01580     if ($editMode or $passwordMode) {
01581         # column not there
01582     } else {
01583         # selection checkbox
01584         if ( FIELD_PERMS()->{act_as} and not $authz->hasPermissions($user, FIELD_PERMS()->{act_as}) ){
01585             push @tableCells, $User->user_id . $imageLink;
01586         } else {
01587             push @tableCells, CGI::a({href=>$changeEUserURL}, $User->user_id) . $imageLink;
01588         }
01589     }
01590     
01591     # Login Status
01592     if ($editMode or $passwordMode) {
01593         # column not there
01594     } else {
01595         # check to see if a user is currently logged in
01596         # DBFIXME use a WHERE clause
01597         my $Key = $db->getKey($User->user_id);
01598         my $is_active = ($Key and time <= $Key->timestamp()+$ce->{sessionKeyTimeout}); # cribbed from check_session
01599         push @tableCells, $is_active ? CGI::b("active") : CGI::em("inactive");
01600     }
01601     
01602     # change password (only in password mode)
01603     if ($passwordMode) {
01604         if ($User->user_id eq $user) {
01605             push @tableCells, ''   # don't allow a professor to change their own password from this form
01606         }
01607         else {
01608             my $fieldName = 'user.' . $User->user_id . '.' . 'new_password';
01609             push @tableCells, CGI::input({type=>"text", name=>$fieldName, size=>14});;
01610         }   
01611     }   
01612     # User ID (edit mode) or Assigned Sets (otherwise)
01613     if ( $passwordMode) {
01614         # straight user ID
01615         push @tableCells, CGI::div({class=>$statusClass}, $User->user_id);
01616     } elsif ($editMode) {
01617         # straight user ID
01618          my $userDetailPage = $urlpath->new(type =>'instructor_user_detail',
01619                                            args =>{
01620                                                      courseID => $courseName,
01621                                                      userID   => $User->user_id, #FIXME eventually this should be a list??
01622                     }
01623         );
01624         my $userDetailUrl = $self->systemLink($userDetailPage,params =>{});
01625         push @tableCells, CGI::a({href=>$userDetailUrl}, $User->user_id);
01626     
01627     } else {
01628         # "edit sets assigned to user" link
01629         #push @tableCells, CGI::a({href=>$setsAssignedToUserURL}, "Edit sets");
01630         if ( FIELD_PERMS()->{sets} and not $authz->hasPermissions($user, FIELD_PERMS()->{sets}) ) {
01631             push @tableCells, "$sets/$totalSets";
01632         } else {
01633             push @tableCells, CGI::a({href=>$setsAssignedToUserURL}, "$sets/$totalSets");
01634         }
01635     }
01636 
01637     # User Fields
01638     foreach my $field ($User->NONKEYFIELDS) {
01639         my $fieldName = 'user.' . $User->user_id . '.' . $field,
01640         my $fieldValue = $User->$field;
01641         my %properties = %{ FIELD_PROPERTIES()->{$field} };
01642         $properties{access} = 'readonly' unless $editMode;
01643         $properties{type} = 'email' if ($field eq 'email_address' and !$editMode and !$passwordMode);
01644         $fieldValue = $self->nbsp($fieldValue) unless $editMode;
01645         push @tableCells, CGI::div({class=>$statusClass}, $self->fieldEditHTML($fieldName, $fieldValue, \%properties));
01646     }
01647     
01648     # PermissionLevel Fields
01649     foreach my $field ($PermissionLevel->NONKEYFIELDS) {
01650         my $fieldName = 'permission.' . $PermissionLevel->user_id . '.' . $field,
01651         my $fieldValue = $PermissionLevel->$field;
01652         # get name out of permission level 
01653         if ( $field eq 'permission' ) {
01654             ($fieldValue) = grep { $ce->{userRoles}->{$_} eq $fieldValue } ( keys ( %{$ce->{userRoles}} ) );
01655         }
01656         my %properties = %{ FIELD_PROPERTIES()->{$field} };
01657         $properties{access} = 'readonly' unless $editMode;
01658         $fieldValue = $self->nbsp($fieldValue) unless $editMode;
01659         push @tableCells, CGI::div({class=>$statusClass}, $self->fieldEditHTML($fieldName, $fieldValue, \%properties));
01660     }
01661     
01662     return CGI::Tr({}, CGI::td({nowrap=>1}, \@tableCells));
01663 }
01664 
01665 sub printTableHTML {
01666     my ($self, $UsersRef, $PermissionLevelsRef, $fieldNamesRef, %options) = @_;
01667     my $r                       = $self->r;
01668     my $urlpath     = $r->urlpath;
01669     my $courseName  = $urlpath->arg("courseID");
01670     my $userTemplate            = $self->{userTemplate};
01671     my $permissionLevelTemplate = $self->{permissionLevelTemplate};
01672     my @Users                   = @$UsersRef;
01673     my @PermissionLevels        = @$PermissionLevelsRef;
01674     my %fieldNames              = %$fieldNamesRef;
01675     
01676     my $editMode                = $options{editMode};
01677     my $passwordMode            = $options{passwordMode};
01678     my %selectedUserIDs         = map { $_ => 1 } @{ $options{selectedUserIDs} };
01679 #   my $currentSort             = $options{currentSort};
01680     my $primarySortField        = $options{primarySortField};
01681     my $secondarySortField      = $options{secondarySortField}; 
01682     my @visableUserIDs          = @{ $options{visableUserIDs} };    
01683         
01684     # names of headings:
01685     my @realFieldNames = (
01686             $userTemplate->KEYFIELDS,
01687             $userTemplate->NONKEYFIELDS,
01688             $permissionLevelTemplate->NONKEYFIELDS,
01689     );
01690     
01691 #   my %sortSubs = %{ SORT_SUBS() };
01692     #my @stateParams = @{ STATE_PARAMS() };
01693     #my $hrefPrefix = $r->uri . "?" . $self->url_args(@stateParams); # $self->url_authen_args
01694     my @tableHeadings;
01695     foreach my $field (@realFieldNames) {
01696         my $result = $fieldNames{$field};
01697         push @tableHeadings, $result;
01698     };
01699     
01700     # prepend selection checkbox? only if we're NOT editing!
01701     unless($editMode or $passwordMode) {
01702 
01703         #warn "line 1582 visibleUserIDs=@visableUserIDs \n";
01704         my %current_state =();
01705         if (@visableUserIDs) {
01706             # This is a hack to get around: Maximum URL Length Is 2,083 Characters in Internet Explorer.
01707             # Without passing visable users the URL is about 250 characters. If the total URL is under the limit
01708             # we will pass visable users. If it is over, we will not pass any and all users will be displayed.
01709             # Maybe we should replace the GET method by POST (but this doesn't look good) --- AKP
01710 
01711             my $visableUserIDsString = join ':', @visableUserIDs;
01712             if (length($visableUserIDsString) < 1830) {
01713                 %current_state = (
01714                     primarySortField => "$primarySortField", 
01715                     secondarySortField => "$secondarySortField",
01716                     visable_user_string => "$visableUserIDsString"
01717                 );
01718             } else {
01719                 %current_state = (
01720                 primarySortField => "$primarySortField", 
01721                 secondarySortField => "$secondarySortField",
01722                 show_all_users => "1"
01723                 );
01724             }   
01725         } else {
01726             %current_state = (
01727             primarySortField => "$primarySortField", 
01728             secondarySortField => "$secondarySortField",
01729             no_visible_users => "1"
01730             );
01731         }   
01732         @tableHeadings = (
01733             "Select",
01734             CGI::a({href => $self->systemLink($urlpath->new(type=>'instructor_user_list', args=>{courseID => $courseName,} ), params=>{labelSortMethod=>'user_id', %current_state})}, 'Login Name'),
01735             "Login Status", 
01736             "Assigned Sets",
01737             CGI::a({href => $self->systemLink($urlpath->new(type=>'instructor_user_list', args=>{courseID => $courseName,} ), params=>{labelSortMethod=>'first_name', %current_state})}, 'First Name'),
01738             CGI::a({href => $self->systemLink($urlpath->new(type=>'instructor_user_list', args=>{courseID => $courseName,} ), params=>{labelSortMethod=>'last_name', %current_state})}, 'Last Name'),
01739             CGI::a({href => $self->systemLink($urlpath->new(type=>'instructor_user_list', args=>{courseID => $courseName,} ), params=>{labelSortMethod=>'email_address', %current_state})}, 'Email Address'),
01740             CGI::a({href => $self->systemLink($urlpath->new(type=>'instructor_user_list', args=>{courseID => $courseName,} ), params=>{labelSortMethod=>'student_id', %current_state})}, 'Student ID'),
01741             CGI::a({href => $self->systemLink($urlpath->new(type=>'instructor_user_list', args=>{courseID => $courseName,} ), params=>{labelSortMethod=>'status', %current_state})}, 'Status'),
01742             CGI::a({href => $self->systemLink($urlpath->new(type=>'instructor_user_list', args=>{courseID => $courseName,} ), params=>{labelSortMethod=>'section', %current_state})}, 'Section'),
01743             CGI::a({href => $self->systemLink($urlpath->new(type=>'instructor_user_list', args=>{courseID => $courseName,} ), params=>{labelSortMethod=>'recitation', %current_state})}, 'Recitation'),
01744             CGI::a({href => $self->systemLink($urlpath->new(type=>'instructor_user_list', args=>{courseID => $courseName,} ), params=>{labelSortMethod=>'comment', %current_state})}, 'Comment'),
01745             CGI::a({href => $self->systemLink($urlpath->new(type=>'instructor_user_list', args=>{courseID => $courseName,} ), params=>{labelSortMethod=>'permission', %current_state})}, 'Permission Level'),
01746         )   
01747     }
01748     if($passwordMode) { 
01749         unshift @tableHeadings, "New Password";
01750         }       
01751         
01752     # print the table
01753     if ($editMode or $passwordMode) {
01754         print CGI::start_table({});
01755     } else {
01756         print CGI::start_table({-border=>1, -nowrap=>1});
01757     }
01758     
01759     print CGI::Tr({}, CGI::th({}, \@tableHeadings));
01760     
01761 
01762     for (my $i = 0; $i < @Users; $i++) {
01763         my $User = $Users[$i];
01764         my $PermissionLevel = $PermissionLevels[$i];
01765         
01766         print $self->recordEditHTML($User, $PermissionLevel,
01767             editMode => $editMode,
01768             passwordMode => $passwordMode,
01769             userSelected => exists $selectedUserIDs{$User->user_id}
01770         );
01771     }
01772     
01773     print CGI::end_table();
01774     #########################################
01775     # if there are no users shown print message
01776     # 
01777     ##########################################
01778     
01779     print CGI::p(
01780                   CGI::i("No students shown.  Choose one of the options above to 
01781                   list the students in the course.")
01782     ) unless @Users;
01783 }
01784 
01785 1;
